<a id="RibbonTrailMesh"></a>

# RibbonTrailMesh

**Inherits:** [PrimitiveMesh](PrimitiveMesh.md) **\<** [Mesh](Mesh.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Represents a straight ribbon-shaped [PrimitiveMesh](PrimitiveMesh.md) with variable width.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**RibbonTrailMesh** represents a straight ribbon-shaped mesh with variable width. The ribbon is composed of a number of flat or cross-shaped sections, each with the same [section_length](RibbonTrailMesh.md#RibbonTrailMesh_property_section_length) and number of [section_segments](RibbonTrailMesh.md#RibbonTrailMesh_property_section_segments). A [curve](RibbonTrailMesh.md#RibbonTrailMesh_property_curve) is sampled along the total length of the ribbon, meaning that the curve determines the size of the ribbon along its length.

This primitive mesh is usually used for particle trails.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="RibbonTrailMesh_property_curve"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Curve](Curve.md) **curve** [ðŸ”—](#RibbonTrailMesh_property_curve)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_curve**\ (\ value\: [Curve](Curve.md)\ )
- [Curve](Curve.md) **get_curve**\ (\ )

Determines the size of the ribbon along its length. The size of a particular section segment is obtained by multiplying the baseline [size](RibbonTrailMesh.md#RibbonTrailMesh_property_size) by the value of this curve at the given distance. For values smaller than ``0``, the faces will be inverted. Should be a unit [Curve](Curve.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RibbonTrailMesh_property_section_length"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **section_length** = `0.2` [ðŸ”—](#RibbonTrailMesh_property_section_length)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_section_length**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_section_length**\ (\ )

The length of a section of the ribbon.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RibbonTrailMesh_property_section_segments"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **section_segments** = `3` [ðŸ”—](#RibbonTrailMesh_property_section_segments)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_section_segments**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_section_segments**\ (\ )

The number of segments in a section. The [curve](RibbonTrailMesh.md#RibbonTrailMesh_property_curve) is sampled on each segment to determine its size. Higher values result in a more detailed ribbon at the cost of performance.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [int](int.md) **get_sections**\ (\ )

The total number of sections on the ribbon.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RibbonTrailMesh_property_size"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **size** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#RibbonTrailMesh_property_size)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_size**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_size**\ (\ )

The baseline size of the ribbon. The size of a particular section segment is obtained by multiplying this size by the value of the [curve](RibbonTrailMesh.md#RibbonTrailMesh_property_curve) at the given distance.
